original_text: The tribe of Gad will be on the other side of Reuben's camp. The leader of the tribe of Gad is Eliasaph, the son of Deuel.
korean_text: 또 갓 지파라 갓 자손의 지휘관은 르우엘의 아들 엘리아삽이요

sentences.original_text: The tribe of Gad will be
on the other side of Reuben's camp
The leader of the tribe of Gad is Eliasaph
